Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 1-A -- 24.36 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 1-A Proposition
(Millage)

Summary:  10 year, 24.36 mills property tax for Road District No. 1-A of the Parish of Beauregard for constructing, improving, operating and maintaining Parish roads and bridges within the District and acquiring the necessary equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1-A of the Parish of Beauregard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a twenty-four and thirty-six hundredths (24.36) mills tax (an estimated $365,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of constructing, improving, operating and maintaining Parish roads and bridges within the District and acquiring the necessary equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: S. BEAU Rec. Dist. #2 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 12 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
South Beauregard Recreation District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage)

Summary:  12 year, 10 mills property tax for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or supporting parks, playgrounds, a multi-purpose recreation/community center and other recreational facilities in South Beauregard Recreation District No. 2, together with the necessary furnishing, equipment and programs therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall South Beauregard Recreation District No. 2 of the Parish of Beauregard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $410,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of twelve (12) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or supporting parks, playgrounds, a multi-purpose recreation/community center and other recreational facilities in the District, together with the necessary furnishings, equipment and programs therefor?
